      • getJSONString

        public static java.lang.String getJSONString(java.io.InputStream in)
        Reads the JSON string from the message body of the given HTTP response.
        Parameters:
        in - The input stream of the HTTP response's message body. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        The JSON string contained in the given message body or whatever is read if an error occurs.

      • convertToString

        public static java.lang.String convertToString(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
        Converts the given list of strings into a string.
        Parameters:
        list - The list of strings to be converted.
        Returns:
        The output formatted string representation of the given list or an empty string if list is null or empty.

      • sendGetRequest

        public static org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse sendGetRequest(java.lang.String url,
                                                                                  java.lang.String authCode)
                                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a Http GET request to the given URL.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL of the API method to call. Cannot be null.
        authCode - The Base64-encoded string of username and password to be used for basic authentication. Null represents no authentication.
        Returns:
        The corresponding Http response for the request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred during the request.

      • sendPostRequest

        public static final org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse sendPostRequest(java.lang.String url,
                                                                                         java.lang.String authCode,
                                                                                         org.apache.http.HttpEntity msg)
                                                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Send a Http POST request to the given URL.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL of the API method to call. Cannot be null.
        authCode - The Base64-encoded string of username and password to be used for basic authentication. Null represents no authentication.
        msg - The message to be sent with the Http request.
        Returns:
        The corresponding Http response for the request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred during the request.

      • sendPatchRequest

                                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Send a Http PATCH request to the given URL.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL of the API method to call. Cannot be null.
        authCode - The Base64-encoded string of username and password to be used for basic authentication. Null represents no authentication.
        msg - The message to be sent with the Http request.
        Returns:
        The corresponding Http response for the request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurred during the request.
